executiveSummary: RC, founder of the pet safety app 'Wolf', pitched to the Sharks seeking $100,000 for 10% equity. The app monitors ownersâ€™ location and triggers a rescue process for their pets if an emergency occurs. Despite some interest in the idea, all Sharks declined to invest due to scalability concerns, trademark issues, and limited market size.
nextSteps: RC plans to continue developing and marketing the Wolf app independently, applying the feedback from the Sharks to strengthen the business model and address brand ownership challenges.
